name: A. I Wanna Be the Guy
statement:
There is a game called "I Wanna Be the Guy", consisting of levels.
Little X and his friend Little Y are addicted to the game. Each of them
wants to pass the whole game.Little X can pass only levels of the game.
And Little Y can pass only levels of the game. You are given the indices
of levels Little X can pass and the indices of levels Little Y can pass.
Will Little X and Little Y pass the whole game, if they cooperate each
other?
editorial:
I Wanna Be the Guy is an interesting game. I strongly recommend it to
you. The problem itself is easy. Just check if all the levels could be
passed by Little X or Little Y. 7894174
